Package it.polimi.ingsw.View

Interface UI

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUI
public interface UI
Interface that defines all methods that a UI must implement in order to interact with the Client.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • setNickname

      void setNickname(String nickname)
      Sets the nickname associated with this UI.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen.

    • startGame

      void startGame()
      Starts the game.

    • updateCommands

      void updateCommands(List<Command> toDisable, List<Command> toEnable)
      Updates available commands. Each command represents an action that the user can take.
      Parameters:
      toDisable - the commands that are to be disabled.
      toEnable - the commands that are to be enabled.

    • notifyServerResponse

      void notifyServerResponse()
      Called to notify that the server sent a response to a previous user action.

    • requestServerInfo

      Map<String,String> requestServerInfo(String defaultIP, int defaultPort)
      Requests the user to input the server information to connect.
      Parameters:
      defaultIP - the default IP to connect to.
      defaultPort - the default port to connect to.
      Returns:
      A Map containing both the IP and the Port in a string format. Their keys are respectively "IP" and "port".

    • requestNickname

      String requestNickname()
      Requests the user to choose a nickname.
      Returns:
      the nickname chosen.

    • requestGameSettings

      void requestGameSettings()
      Requests the user to choose the game settings. Then, sends it to the server.

    • requestTowerColor

      void requestTowerColor(ObservableByClient game)
      Requests the user to choose a tower color. Then, sends it to the server.
      Parameters:
      game - the game used to retrieve the new tower colors left from.

    • requestWizard

      void requestWizard(ObservableByClient game)
      Requests the user to choose a wizard type. Then, sends it to the server.
      Parameters:
      game - the game used to retrieve the new wizard types left from.

    • requestWaitStart

      void requestWaitStart()
      Requests the user to wait until all players are ready to play.

    • displayInfo

      void displayInfo(String info)
      Displays given information to the user.
      Parameters:
      info - the information to be displayed.

    • displayError

      void displayError(String error, boolean isFatal)
      Displays an error that occurred to the user.
      Parameters:
      error - the error to display.
      isFatal - true if said error causes the game to stop.

    • updateSetup

      void updateSetup(ObservableByClient game, UserActionType actionTaken)
      Updates available parameters to select during setup.
      Parameters:
      game - the game used to retrieve the new parameters from.
      actionTaken - the userAction that caused this function to be called.

    • displayBoard

      void displayBoard(ObservableByClient game, UserActionType actionTaken)
      Displays the current board to the user.
      Parameters:
      game - the game used to retrieve the new data from.
      actionTaken - the userAction that caused this function to be called.

    • displayWinners

      void displayWinners(TowerColor winner, List<String> winners, List<String> losers)
      Displays the game winners. Then, ends the game.
      Parameters:
      winner - the tower color of the winner of thi match.
      winners - the nicknames of the winners of this match.
      losers - the nicknames of the losers of this match.
